description:
http://www.CityTV.nl
http://www.t-dose.org/

T -Dose 2016, Why we are all going to shit in the next 30 years due to computers, Jeroen Baten.
Paper: 

Now, this is not a doom and gloom lecture.
Actually it is a talk about what is going to happen in the next 30 years.
It is a talk about what is called "postcapitalism".
It is a talk about how almost all jobs are going to disappear due to automation.
But also how we are going to think about this this and come up with solutions.
It talks about the three big challenges we need to face.
And yes, this involves you as well!
title: T-Dose 2016, Why we are all going to shit in the next 30 years due to computers, Jeroen Baten
